docs.title: 嗨，欢迎来到我的小窝 🎉
docs.text: 这里是 Zimo 的小站，一边学习一边记录的地方。 目前正在同时进行 雅思备考 ✈️ 和 11408 计算机考研 📚， 也会不时分享一些编程项目、学习心得，还有灵感碎片。

docs.title: 🗂️ 这里能看到什么？
docs.text:
• ✍️ IELTS：阅读精读、写作素材、听力口语练习
  • 🖥️ 考研 11408：笔记整理、真题解析、错题复盘
  • 🚀 Projects：Kaggle、课程设计、小实验分享
  • 🌱 杂记：灵感记录、生活随笔

  • 👉 每个大类首页：该类全部内容，按时间倒序排列

docs.title: ✍️ Ancient Money 写作 / 口语表达提炼
docs.text: 来源：剑桥雅思阅读真经5 Reading Passage 9

docs.title: 🗣️ 可迁移主题
docs.text:
• 货币与文明发展
  • 艺术与铸币演变
  • 社会系统与标识（coins as symbols）
  • 政府/个体与经济行为（state vs private minting）

docs.title: 🧾 高分表达结构整理
docs.text: 表达 中文含义 用法示例 medium of exchange 交换媒介 Money served as a medium of exchange. accomplished and accepted fact 被确立且被接受的事实 The establishment of coinage became an accomplished and accepted fact. impress portraits on coins 在硬币上压印肖像 Governments began to impress rulers' heads on currency. deteriorate from an artistic standpoint 从艺术角度退化 The design of coins deteriorated from an artistic standpoint. extant record 仍然存在的记录 Ancient coins are sometimes the only extant record of lost civilizations.

docs.title: ✨ 可用于写作 Task 2 / 口语 Part 3
docs.text:
• “The evolution of currency reflects the evolution of civilisation.”
  • “Coins served not only as money, but as a means of propaganda.”
  • “Even in ancient times, the standardisation of value was crucial to trade.”

docs.title: 📘 Ancient Money 精读笔记
docs.text: 本文整理自《剑桥雅思阅读真经5》Reading Passage 9，内容关于货币的起源与发展。

docs.title: 🧩 段落 A
docs.text:
英文原文： Money as a medium of exchange in barter and trade has always in all times found expression in some form or other from necessity thereof...

中文翻译： 金钱作为以物易物和贸易中的一种交换媒介，自古以来总会因现实需要而以某种形式出现...

长难句分析： - 主干为 “Money has always found expression...” - 插入状语：as a medium of exchange...

逻辑连接词： - in all times：强调普遍性 - from necessity thereof：因需求而生

高频词汇： - barter：以物易物 - necessity：必要性 - in some form or other：以各种形式

docs.title: 🧩 段落 B
docs.text:
英文原文： Gold and silver were originally in lumps, nuggets and bars...

中文翻译： 黄金和白银最初是以块状、金块和条形的形式存在的，并通过称重的方式在商业交易中用于支付...

长难句分析： - 原因状语 from “Because there was no certainty...” - 结构嵌套：necessity arose → die stamp invented → impressed purity

逻辑连接词： - because：说明压印硬币产生的原因 - thereby：引出结果 - so originated：结论/起源表达

高频词汇： - vouch for：担保 - purity：纯度 - die stamp：压印模具 - crude / lumps：原始金属块

docs.title: 🧩 段落 C
docs.text:
英文原文： When the actual coinage of money was an accomplished and accepted fact...

中文翻译： 当货币的实际铸造成为一项确立并被普遍接受的事实时，它得到了希腊诸国的进一步推动...

长难句分析： - 主句+定语从句+时间状语 - 动作并列：stamping → impress → identified

逻辑连接词： - finally：行为转折与递进 - in consequence of which：因果连接

高频词汇： - impress crude portraits：压印粗略头像 - proficient in the art：精通工艺 - Denarii：古罗马银币

docs.title: 🧩 段落 D
docs.text:
英文原文： After the decline and fall of the Roman empire...

中文翻译： 在罗马帝国衰落之后，从艺术的角度来看，货币的铸造开始退化...

长难句分析： - it remained for ... to ...：正式句式结构 - 定语从句穿插多个动作：introduced... established...

逻辑连接词： - after / from：时间推进 - until：阶段性终点连接 - as：原因/时间并用

高频词汇： - deteriorate：退化 - milling money：压印货币（vs hammering） - symmetry：对称性

docs.title: 🧩 段落 E
docs.text:
英文原文： The Chinese asserted a coinage forty centuries ago...

中文翻译： 中国人在四千年前就宣称已经有了货币制度，并且似乎建立了一套完全自成体系的铸币组织...

长难句分析： - 主干：this metal ... developed into... - 从句链：which ... / being ... / as one did...

逻辑连接词： - yet：转折 - no doubt：强调推断 - as：时间与背景

高频词汇： - hieroglyphics thereon：其上的象形文字 - string like beads：串成串以便携带 - cash：古代制钱

docs.title: 🧩 段落 F
docs.text:
英文原文： The first money used in America was furnished chiefly by...

中文翻译： 美国最早使用的钱币主要由英国和西班牙提供...

长难句分析： - 定语从句修饰 silver pieces - 被动结构 + known as + apposition

逻辑连接词： - but：转折 - where：地点引导 - which：限定说明

高频词汇： - Oak / Pine Tree money：橡树币 / 松树币 - mint / strike：造币 / 压印 - rare specimen：罕见样币

docs.title: 🧩 段落 G
docs.text:
英文原文： During and after the American war for independence...

中文翻译： 在美国独立战争期间及其后，一些硬币由私人个人以及国会命令铸造...

长难句分析： - 多时态交替出现 - 时间推进 + 行为并列 + 特定法案背景说明

逻辑连接词： - during / after：时间背景 - when / which：从句标志 - as early as：早在...强调时间

高频词汇： - strike coins：铸币 - patterns / specimens：样式币 / 试铸币 - extant record：现存的历史证据

docs.title: Soviet’s New Working Week - Reading Analysis
docs.text: tags: #ielts/reading #reading-analysis

docs.title: 🧾 英文原文
docs.text: “There are no fortresses that Bolsheviks cannot storm.” With these words, Stalin expressed the dynamic self-confidence of the Soviet Union’s...

docs.title: 📌 段落主旨
docs.text: 斯大林以“五年计划”展现苏联工业化的雄心与全国动员的热情。

docs.title: 🧩 长难句结构分析
docs.text:
1. 主句 + 限定性定语从句修饰 fortresses
  2. 形容词前置修饰 + overnight 作状语
  3. 原因状语从句 as 引导
  4. 现在分词作结果状语

docs.title: 🔗 逻辑连接词归纳
docs.text:
• with（伴随）
  • between...and（时间范围）
  • as（原因）
  • leaving（结果）

docs.title: 🧾 英文原文
docs.text: Enthusiasm spread to time itself, in the desire to make the state a huge efficient machine, where not a moment would...

docs.title: 📌 段落主旨
docs.text: 列宁与布尔什维克借鉴泰勒与福特的效率理念，推动“新苏维埃人”的培养与工业计划。

docs.title: 🧩 长难句结构分析
docs.text:
1. 地点状语从句 where 修饰 machine
  2. 非限定性定语从句 whose 修饰 Taylor
  3. 动名词短语作主语

docs.title: 🔗 逻辑连接词归纳
docs.text:
• in the desire to（目的）
  • whose（所属）
  • and（并列）
  • where（地点）

docs.title: 🧾 英文原文
docs.text: Yet this was Communism whose goals had always included improving the lives of the proletariat. One major step in that...

docs.title: 📌 段落主旨
docs.text: 缩短工时与三班制并行，旨在提高产量但增加了工人负担。

docs.title: 🧩 长难句结构分析
docs.text:
1. 非限定性定语从句 whose 修饰 Communism
  2. 限定性定语从句修饰 announcement
  3. 并列宾语从句结构

docs.title: 🔗 逻辑连接词归纳
docs.text:
• yet（转折）
  • for（原因）
  • and（并列）

docs.title: 🧾 英文原文
docs.text: Hardly had that policy been announced, though, than Yuri Larin, who had been a close associate of Lenin and...

docs.title: 📌 段落主旨
docs.text: 拉林提出连续工作周构想，获斯大林支持并迅速推行。

docs.title: 🧩 长难句结构分析
docs.text:
1. 倒装结构 hardly...than
  2. 非限定性定语从句修饰 Yuri Larin
  3. 反问句 + 目的状语从句 so that
  4. 宾语从句结构
  5. 非限定性定语从句 whose 修饰 the Plan

docs.title: 🔗 逻辑连接词归纳
docs.text:
• hardly...than（一…就…）
  • though（让步）
  • so that（目的）
  • whose（所属）

docs.title: 🧾 英文原文
docs.text: The idea seemed simple enough, but turned out to be very complicated in practice. Obviously, the workers couldn’t be made...

docs.title: 📌 段落主旨
docs.text: 实施细则复杂化，工人分组错开休息以保证全年生产。

docs.title: 🧩 长难句结构分析
docs.text:
1. 转折并列结构 but
  2. 情态结构 would have + 宾语 + 状语
  3. 独立主格 + 限定性定语从句
  4. 宾语从句 what 引导

docs.title: 🔗 逻辑连接词归纳
docs.text:
• but（转折）
  • since（原因）
  • for（原因）
  • however（转折）

docs.title: 🧾 英文原文
docs.text: Official propaganda touted the material and cultural benefits of the new scheme. Workers would get more rest; production and employment...

docs.title: 📌 段落主旨
docs.text: 官方强调制度的物质与文化好处，并弱化家庭影响的重要性。

docs.title: 🧩 长难句结构分析
docs.text:
1. 分号分隔的并列主句
  2. 原因状语从句 for 引导
  3. 非限定性定语从句 where 引导

docs.title: 🔗 逻辑连接词归纳
docs.text:
• for（原因）
  • but（转折）
  • since（原因）
  • and besides（补充）

docs.title: 🧾 英文原文
docs.text: The continuous work week, hailed as a Utopia where time itself was conquered and the sluggish Sunday abolished forever, spread...

docs.title: 📌 段落主旨
docs.text: 连续工作周迅速推广，但管理混乱、家庭协调困难，工人不满。

docs.title: 🧩 长难句结构分析
docs.text:
1. 非限定性定语从句 hailed as... 修饰 continuous work week
  2. 定语从句 where 修饰 Utopia
  3. 结果状语从句 so 引导
  4. 伴随状语 with 引导

docs.title: 🔗 逻辑连接词归纳
docs.text:
• where（地点）
  • so（结果）
  • with（伴随）

docs.title: 🧾 英文原文
docs.text: The Soviet government might have ignored all that, but the new week was far from having the vaunted effect on...

docs.title: 📌 段落主旨
docs.text: 复杂轮换制度削弱了生产效率与工人责任感。

docs.title: 🧩 长难句结构分析
docs.text:
1. 转折并列结构 but
  2. 介词短语作背景 with 引导
  3. 非限定性定语从句 who 修饰 people

docs.title: 🔗 逻辑连接词归纳
docs.text:
• but（转折）
  • with（伴随）
  • who（定语从句）

docs.title: 🧾 英文原文
docs.text: As a result, the new week started to lose ground. Stalin’s speech of June 1931, which criticised the “depersonalised labour”...

docs.title: 📌 段落主旨
docs.text: 六天工作周取代连续工作周，最终回归传统制度。

docs.title: 🧩 长难句结构分析
docs.text:
1. 非限定性定语从句 which 修饰 speech
  2. 非限定性定语从句 which 修饰 six-day week
  3. 并列主句 and 连接

docs.title: 🔗 逻辑连接词归纳
docs.text:
• as a result（结果）
  • which（定语从句）
  • and（并列）
  • finally（时间顺序）

docs.title: 📌 高频词汇表（合并去重）
docs.text: 单词 / 短语 词性 中文含义 abolish v. 废除 adoption n. 采用 arrangement n. 安排 assign v. 分配 at the height of phr. 在…的高峰期 capacity n. 容量；能力 closure n. 关闭 colour-coding n. 颜色编码 come up with phr.v 提出 coordinate v. 协调 cram into phr.v 挤进；塞满 crucial adj. 关键的 cult n. 狂热崇拜 depersonalised labour n. 去人格化劳动 disrupt v. 干扰；破坏 emulate v. 模仿；赶超 epidemic n. 流行；蔓延 establishment n. 机构；单位 fad n. 一时的流行 flourish v. 繁荣；兴旺 haphazardly adv. 随意地；杂乱地 hail as phr.v 称颂为 hasty adj. 仓促的 idle adj. 空闲的 ill-conceived adj. 考虑不周的 ingenious adj. 巧妙的 lose ground phr. 失势 maintenance n. 维护；保养 mnemonic adj./n. 记忆的；助记符 mortal blow n. 致命打击 nuclear family n. 核心家庭 reintroduction n. 重新引入 resistant adj. 有抵抗力的 reveal v. 显示；揭示 rotation system n. 轮换制度 scheme n. 计划；方案 sideline v. 使靠边；排挤 sluggish adj. 缓慢的；懒散的 stagger v. 错开 succumb v. 屈服 take into account phr. 考虑到 tend v. 照料；护理 tout v. 吹捧；宣扬 uninterrupted adj. 连续的 vaunted adj. 被吹嘘的 virtually adv. 几乎 without reference to phr. 不考虑

docs.title: Soviet’s New Working Week - Writing Cards
docs.text: tags: #ielts/writing #writing-cards

docs.title: 🌍 背景话题
docs.text:
• 劳动制度改革与生产效率
  • 政府政策与社会影响
  • 技术与管理模式对社会结构的冲击

docs.title: ✍️ 可迁移句式（中英对照）
docs.text:
• 英：The government implemented a rotation system to maximise the use of resources. 中：政府实施了轮换制度以最大化资源利用率。 🧩 用于描述制度改革、资源管理类话题

  • 英：This ambitious plan was hailed as a utopia where time itself was conquered. 中：这一雄心勃勃的计划被誉为时间本身被征服的乌托邦。 🧩 用于描述理想化改革、宏大叙事类话题

  • 英：Without taking into account human and social realities, efficiency cannot simply be imposed from above. 中：如果不考虑人文与社会现实，效率无法仅靠上层强行推行。 🧩 用于政策批评、社会学反思类话题

  • 英：The scheme aimed to improve productivity but ended up disrupting social life. 中：该计划旨在提高生产力，却最终扰乱了社会生活。 🧩 用于成效与副作用对比类话题

  • 英：Coordination of family schedules was virtually impossible under the new system. 中：在新制度下，家庭作息的协调几乎不可能。 🧩 用于社会结构变化、家庭生活类话题

  • 英：A bold but ill-conceived experiment was brought to an end. 中：一个大胆却考虑不周的实验宣告结束。 🧩 用于改革失败总结类话题

docs.title: 🧩 适用话题分类
docs.text:
• 政府与公共政策
  • 社会变革与传统
  • 经济发展与劳动市场
  • 技术进步与社会管理
  • 家庭与社会结构

docs.title: 📘 Talc Powder – Reading Analysis
docs.text: tags: #ielts/reading #精读 #talc

docs.title: 🔹 Paragraph 1
docs.text:
原文：

High in the French Pyrenees, some 1,700 m above sea level, lies Trimouns, a huge deposit of hydrated magnesium silicate—talc to you and me.

中文翻译（逐句） 在法国比利牛斯山的高处，海拔约 1700 米，坐落着特里蒙斯矿——那里蕴藏着大量水合硅酸镁，也就是我们常说的滑石

长难句分析 - 倒装 High in the French Pyrenees … lies Trimouns - 插入 talc to you and me - 核心比较结构 is nowhere better displayed than …

🧩 逻辑连接词

信号词 功能 and of course 强调补充，举出最典型用途 but 转折，对比常规用途与利基应用 nowhere better than 比较强调，突出“食品/农业”多样用途

📌 高频词汇

单词 / 短语 中文含义 近义词 注释 talc 滑石 — 核心话题词 deposit 矿床；沉积物 reserve, stockpile 自然资源类高频 manufacture 制造；生产 produce, make manufacture products versatility 多功能性 adaptability, flexibility 正面抽象名词 niche market 利基市场，小众市场 specialized segment 商业写作常用

docs.title: 🔹 Paragraph 2
docs.text:
原文：

Take, for example, the chewing-gum business. Every year, Talc de Luzenac France—which owns and operates the Trimouns mine—supplies about 6 000 tonnes of

段落主旨 但滑石究竟如何用于口香糖生产？

长难句分析 - 非限定定语从句 —which owns and operates … - 定语从句 who has been with Luzenac for 22 years - 原因状语从句 because it’s non-reactive chemically - 对比结构 on the other hand

🧩 逻辑连接词

信号词 功能 Take, for example 举例引入口香糖案例 on the other hand 对比转折，突出滑石优势 because 引出滑石惰性原因 then 顺序：随后添加成分

📌 高频词汇

单词 / 短语 中文含义 近义词 注释 gum base 胶基 — 咀嚼感核心成分 filler 填充剂 additive, extender 滑石角色 non-reactive 不反应的 inert 化学惰性 dust (v.) 撒粉 sprinkle 动词用法 stick (v.) 粘连 adhere, cling 包装工序

docs.title: 🔹 Paragraph 3
docs.text:
原文：

The chewing gum business is, however, just one example of talc’s use in the food sector. For the past 20 years or so, olive-oil processors in Spain h

段落主旨 1. 在过去约 20 年里，西班牙的橄榄油加工商利用滑石的独特特性，帮助提高从压碎橄榄中提取油的产量。 2. 根据 Patrick Delord 的说法，滑石特别适用于处理他所谓的“问题橄榄”。

长难句分析 - 现在完成进行：processors have been taking advantage of... - 原因状语从句：because they produce a lot of extra foam... - 嵌套限制性定语从句：that acts as a natural emulsifier

🧩 逻辑连接词

信号词 功能 however 引出橄榄油应用，转折 according to 引用专家证言 preferably 表优先条件 not only that 递进补充负面影响

📌 高频词汇

单词 / 短语 中文含义 近义词 注释 extract 提取 derive, obtain boost the oil they extract centrifuge 用离心机分离 — 技术词 emulsion 乳化液 — 橄榄油提取难点 biodegradable 生物降解 — 环保类关键词 fine solid 细颗粒固体 — 泡沫形成关键

docs.title: 🔹 Paragraph 4
docs.text:
原文：

“If you add between a half and two per cent of talc by weight during the stirring process

段落主旨 1. “如果你在搅拌过程中按重量加入 0.5–2 % 的滑石，它会吸收橄榄中的天然乳化剂，从而提高可提取的油量，”Delord 说。

长难句分析 - 条件句链：If you add … it absorbs … and so boosts … - 定语从句：which again improves the yield - 原因从句：because talc is chemically inert

🧩 逻辑连接词

信号词 功能 If … then 条件—结果 so 因果结果 in addition 补充 however 转折：不影响品质 because 原因

📌 高频词汇

单词 / 短语 中文含义 近义词 注释 boost 提高，增强 enhance, increase boost oil yield emulsifier 乳化剂 — 与 emulsion 配对 platey 片状的 flaky, layered 技术词 yield 产量，出油率 output improve yield chemically inert 化学惰性 non-reactive 与上一段呼应

docs.title: 🔹 Paragraph 5
docs.text:
原文：

If the use of talc in olive oil processing and in chewing gum is long established, new applications in the food and agriculture industries

段落主旨 1. 其中一个很有前景的新市场是水果作物的防护，这项技术目前在美国率先推广。

🧩 逻辑连接词

信号词 功能 If … then … 对比“既定用途”与“新探索” also 递进补充：持续探索 just like 类比：水果 vs 人 in fact 引出数据 however 让步转折 not so much A as B 强调真正原因

📌 高频词汇

单词 / 短语 中文含义 注释 long-established 已确立已久的 描述既定用途 constantly being sought 持续被探索 被动结构 fruit-crop protection 水果作物防护 新市场术语 heat stress 热应激 作物生理 surface temperature 表面温度 导致晒伤直接原因

docs.title: 🔹 Paragraph 6
docs.text:
原文：

To combat this, farmers normally use either chemicals or spray a continuous fine canopy of mist above the fruit trees or bushes.

段落主旨 1. “所以我们的想法是用滑石为水果‘涂层’，以保护其免受阳光，”

长难句分析 - 目的状语：To combat this … - 同位语解释：a wet-table powder—something that...

🧩 逻辑连接词

信号词 / 结构 功能 To combat this 目的 The trouble is 引出核心问题 What’s more 递进负面影响 So our idea was 结果-对策 But to do this 转折：技术挑战 in order to 目的 and of course 补充常识 No-one’s going to 负面假设

📌 高频词汇

单词 / 短语 中文含义 注释 canopy 覆盖层 canopy of mist commodity 商品；宝贵资源 water as commodity waterlogged 积水的 ground waterlogged hydrophobic 疏水的 talc property wet-table powder 可湿性粉剂 技术词 suspension 悬浮液 spray suspension surface tension 表面张力 果皮蜡质层 viable 可行的 viable product coat (v.) 包覆 coat fruit with talc

docs.title: 🔹 Paragraph 7
docs.text:
原文：

Initial trials in the State of Washington in 2003 showed that when the product was sprayed onto Granny Smith apples

段落主旨 1. 2003 年在华盛顿州的初步试验表明，当该产品喷洒在青苹苹果上时，可将其表面温度降低，并把日灼发生率降低多达 60 %。

🧩 逻辑连接词

信号词 功能 Initial trials showed that 引实验数据 by up to 60 % 量化结果 Today 时间对比 although 让步，引出次要市场

📌 高频词汇

单词 / 短语 中文含义 注释 trial 试验，测试 initial trials incidence of sunburn 日灼发生率 统计用 commercial year 商业化年度 2nd year primary target 主要目标客户 市场术语 sector 行业、领域 grape growers long-term potential 长期潜力 市场展望

docs.title: ✍️ 写作素材卡：《Talc Powder》
docs.text: tags: #writing/quote #ielts/writing/task2 #ielts/vocab

docs.title: 📖 素材背景
docs.text:
• 来源：剑桥雅思阅读《Talc Powder》
  • 话题方向：农业创新、食品工业、材料应用、安全与环境、工业优化

docs.title: 🎯 事实描述类
docs.text:
• Talc is remarkably efficient at helping fruit to grow and stay healthy.

    滑石在帮助水果生长和保持健康方面极为高效。

  • Just like people, fruit can get sunburned.

    就像人一样，水果也会被晒伤。

  • Fruit-flavoured chewing gum is slightly acidic and would react with the calcium carbonate.

    水果味口香糖略带酸性，会与碳酸钙发生反应。

  • In the factory, talc is also used to dust the gum base pellets and to stop sticking during the packing process.

    滑石也被用于给胶基颗粒除粉，防止在包装过程中粘连。

docs.title: 🧠 逻辑连接
docs.text:
• The true versatility of this mineral is nowhere better displayed than in its use in certain niche markets.

    这种矿物真正的多功能性在某些利基市场中体现得最为充分。

  • On the other hand, talc makes an ideal filler because it’s non-reactive chemically.

    而滑石是理想的填充剂，因为它在化学上不活跃。

docs.title: 🔍 立场评价 / 替代优劣
docs.text:
• Talc is inert and non-abrasive, and does not affect the flavour, colour or chemical composition.

    滑石具有惰性和非磨蚀性，不会影响风味、颜色或化学成分。

  • Talc appears to reduce the incidence of fungus on fruit and is seen as a useful alternative to chemical sprays.

    滑石似乎能减少真菌发生率，被视为化学喷剂的有益替代品。

docs.title: 🧾 可引用例证
docs.text:
• 橄榄油行业：使用滑石吸收乳化剂，提升油产量，提高1-3%，每1%可增收$40,000（中等厂商）
  • 口香糖制造：使用滑石作为填充剂，避免与酸反应，比碳酸钙更安全
  • 农业防晒：滑石用于水果防晒，替代高耗水喷雾，减少晒伤，提升果实外观与口感
  • Invelop Maximum SPF：美国市场商品化应用，试验中将日灼率降低60%

docs.title: 🪜 适用话题建议
docs.text: 话题类型 可用素材 材料科学 / 工业应用 talc as filler / non-reactive / non-abrasive 农业技术革新 fruit protection / SPF product / sunburn prevention 可持续替代方案 alternative to chemical sprays / low water usage 产业效益提升 improved yield / up to $40,000 gain per % 健康与环境安全 inert / harmless / non-toxic in food context

docs.title: 📘 精读笔记：《Graffiti: Street Art or Crime》
docs.text: 本文是一篇关于街头艺术与社会争议的雅思阅读文章，通过法院判决与艺术展对比，揭示涂鸦在不同文化和立场中引发的分裂态度。

docs.title: Paragraph 1
docs.text:
原文：On the face of it, as a society, we seem to be a little mixed-up when it comes to “graffiti”…

翻译：表面上看，社会在对“涂鸦”的认知上颇为混乱……

解析：引出主旨，展示社会认知的“二元性” → “graffiti” or “street art”？讽刺意味明显。

docs.title: Paragraph 2
docs.text:
关键词：polarised institutions / criminal damage / £1m loss

翻译：英国制度层面对涂鸦的态度已撕裂，DPM 成员因“犯罪损害”入狱。

长难句讲解：含 where 引导定语从句、多个插入成分 → 考语义逻辑和句型嵌套能力。

docs.title: Paragraph 3–5
docs.text:
主旨：Tate Modern 展出街头艺术，与法院判刑形成鲜明对比。

亮点句：There is a huge irony in the juxtaposition of the two events.

结构亮点：并列结构反复出现，展示对立立场。

docs.title: Paragraph 6
docs.text:
重点词：draconian punishments / economic crimes

赏析：用巴黎 vs 伦敦的类比，暗示街头艺术的文化价值。语言充满嘲讽。

docs.title: Paragraph 7–9
docs.text:
空题高频段：criminals vs artists / appreciated vs avoided / easygoing vs harsh

结构表达：On the one hand... On the other hand... 是典型议论文模式。

docs.title: Paragraph 10–12
docs.text:
主旨句：Street art is a highly polarising phenomenon.

亮点句型： - reconcile X with Y - not by sending them to jail - commissioned… to work with vulnerable youth

结尾立场：批判“惩罚”，转而强调教育与艺术支持。

docs.title: 📚 高频表达&写作复用建议
docs.text: 表达 用法 场景 a highly polarising phenomenon 主旨句式 争议话题类作文开头 reconcile X with Y 高阶结构 表达“平衡两种矛盾”观点 appreciated and celebrated 正向表达 艺术自由/科技进步类 not by sending them to jail 明确立场 教育 vs 惩罚类话题 draconian punishments 批判类词汇 法律、政策类负面立场 irony in the juxtaposition 逻辑连接 对比结构 / 反差表达

docs.title: 🧠 长难句结构归纳
docs.text:
• 英文主干 + 多个修饰从句（定语、状语）+ 插入结构
  • 常见连接词：where / while / even though / in contrast / such that
  • 多重定语叠加，考察逻辑链与句意提取能力

docs.title: 🧭 阅读题型补充（Summary Completion）
docs.text:
空 正确答案 原文关键词 同义替换 1 dividing polarised divide institutions 2 exhibited display exhibition 3 promoting bringing into / legitimised promote 4 rewards sell books / fame appreciation 5 penalties draconian punishment punishment 6 criminals are criminals 原词匹配 7 easygoing relaxed tolerant 8 avoided avoided as wrongdoers 原词匹配 9 appreciated appreciated as artists 原词匹配

📌 由 GPT 精读生成 ｜适配 Obsidian 学术笔记结构

docs.title: ✍️ 写作素材卡：《Graffiti: Street Art or Crime》
docs.text: tags: #writing/quote #ielts/writing/task2 #ielts/vocab

docs.title: 📖 素材背景
docs.text:
• 来源：剑桥雅思阅读《Graffiti: Street Art or Crime》
  • 话题方向：艺术 vs 犯罪、表达自由、社会态度分裂

docs.title: 🎯 表态类
docs.text:
• Street art is a highly polarising phenomenon.

    街头艺术是一种高度分裂的社会现象。

  • How can artistic expression be reconciled with public fear and loathing?

    如何在艺术表达与社会恐惧之间达成平衡？

  • Not by sending them to jail.

    不是通过监禁来解决。

docs.title: 🧠 逻辑连接
docs.text:
• There is a huge irony in the juxtaposition of the two events.

    两件事的并列呈现充满讽刺。

  • On the one hand... on the other hand...

    一方面……另一方面……（经典对立结构）

docs.title: 🔍 立场评价
docs.text:
• Draconian punishments for economic crimes

    对“经济类犯罪”的严苛惩罚（用于批判过度执法）

  • Artists should be appreciated and celebrated.

    艺术家应该被欣赏和赞美（积极立场）

docs.title: 🧾 可引用例证
docs.text:
• Banksy：将街头艺术带入主流，被泰特美术馆展出，与Andy Warhol同台
  • DPM成员入狱：艺术家因公共财产损害被判刑，引发艺术圈与法律之间的矛盾冲突
  • Greenwich政府做法：政府支持街头艺术家参与社区教育

docs.title: 🪜 适用话题建议
docs.text:
话题类型 可用素材 犯罪与惩罚 draconian punishments / not by sending them to jail 艺术与自由 appreciated and celebrated / Banksy legitimised the genre 社会认知分裂 polarising phenomenon / irony in juxtaposition 教育 vs 惩罚 community workshops / working with vulnerable youth

📌 可配合 Obsidian + Anki 使用，建议提炼其中表达制作为卡片复习

docs.title: sentence 1
docs.text:
START 问答题 正面: 大量投资教育的国家往往能取得更高水平的创新。 背面: Countries that invest heavily in education tend to achieve higher levels of innovation. TARGET DECK: IELTS::Sentence::RelativeClause FILE TAGS: #anki #sentence #relative_clause

END

docs.title: sentence 10
docs.text:
START 问答题 正面: 住在校园里的学生可以节省更多时间。 背面: Students who live on campus can save more time. TARGET DECK: IELTS::Sentence::RelativeClause FILE TAGS: #anki #sentence #relative_clause

END

docs.title: sentence 11
docs.text:
START 问答题 正面: 照顾宠物的人更友好。 背面: People who take care of pets are friendlier. TARGET DECK: IELTS::Sentence::RelativeClause FILE TAGS: #anki #sentence #relative_clause

END

docs.title: sentence 2
docs.text:
START 问答题 正面: 拥有很多公园的城市通常有更清新的空气。 背面: Cities that have lots of parks usually have cleaner air. TARGET DECK: IELTS::Sentence::RelativeClause FILE TAGS: #anki #sentence #relative_clause

END

docs.title: sentence 3
docs.text:
START 问答题 正面: 人们在有更好公交系统的城市里更幸福。 背面: People feel happier in the city which has a better bus system. TARGET DECK: IELTS::Sentence::RelativeClause FILE TAGS: #anki #sentence #relative_clause

END

docs.title: sentence 4
docs.text:
START 问答题 正面: 经常练习英语口语的学生通常更自信。 背面: Students who practice English speaking regularly are often more confident. TARGET DECK: IELTS::Sentence::RelativeClause FILE TAGS: #anki #sentence #relative_clause

END

docs.title: sentence 5
docs.text:
START 问答题 正面: 喜欢运动的人通常更健康。 背面: People who like playing sports are usually healthier. TARGET DECK: IELTS::Sentence::RelativeClause FILE TAGS: #anki #sentence #relative_clause

END

docs.title: sentence 6
docs.text:
START 问答题 正面: 提供优质服务的杂货店通常有更多顾客。 背面: Groceries that provide good services usually have more customers. TARGET DECK: IELTS::Sentence::RelativeClause FILE TAGS: #anki #sentence #relative_clause

END

docs.title: sentence 7
docs.text:
START 问答题 正面: 拥有很多书的图书馆很有用。 背面: Libraries that have many books are useful. TARGET DECK: IELTS::Sentence::RelativeClause FILE TAGS: #anki #sentence #relative_clause

END

docs.title: sentence 8
docs.text:
START 问答题 正面: 能熟练使用电脑的学生学习更高效。 背面: Students who are good at using laptops are more efficient in studying. TARGET DECK: IELTS::Sentence::RelativeClause FILE TAGS: #anki #sentence #relative_clause

END

docs.title: sentence 9
docs.text:
START 问答题 正面: 经常吃水果的人更健康。 背面: People who eat fruit regularly are healthier. TARGET DECK: IELTS::Sentence::RelativeClause FILE TAGS: #anki #sentence #relative_clause

END

docs.title: as a medium of
docs.text:
• 词性：phr.
  • 释义：作为……的媒介
  • 例句：Money served as a medium of exchange in barter and trade.

docs.title: barter
docs.text:
• 词性：n./v.
  • 释义：以物易物
  • 例句：Barter was the earliest form of trade before coinage.

docs.title: thereof
docs.text:
• 词性：adv./formal
  • 释义：由此，其
  • 例句：from necessity thereof.

docs.title: lumps
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：块状物
  • 例句：Gold and silver were originally in lumps, nuggets and bars.

docs.title: nuggets
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：小金块
  • 例句：Gold nuggets were used before standardized coins.

docs.title: the purity of
docs.text:
• 词性：phr.
  • 释义：……的纯度
  • 例句：There was no certainty of the purity of the metal.

docs.title: vouched for
docs.text:
• 词性：v. (past)
  • 释义：担保，作保证
  • 例句：These divisions were gradually made, vouched for, and a die stamp invented.

docs.title: attesting
docs.text:
• 词性：v. (present participle)
  • 释义：证明，作证
  • 例句：Thereby attesting to its purity and value.

docs.title: coinage
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：铸币制度
  • 例句：So originated the first acts of coinage.

docs.title: crude
docs.text:
• 词性：adj.
  • 释义：粗糙的
  • 例句：They began to impress upon their coins crude portraits.

docs.title: portraits
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：肖像
  • 例句：Crude portraits or heads of living persons and rulers.

docs.title: standpoint
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：立场，角度
  • 例句：From an artistic standpoint, money began to deteriorate.

docs.title: deteriorate
docs.text:
• 词性：v.
  • 释义：退化，恶化
  • 例句：The coinage of money began to deteriorate.

docs.title: hieroglyphics
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：象形文字
  • 例句：The peculiar hieroglyphics thereon being generally the emperor’s name.

docs.title: thereon
docs.text:
• 词性：adv.
  • 释义：在其上
  • 例句：The hieroglyphics thereon being generally the emperor’s name.

docs.title: symmetry
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：对称性
  • 例句：Coins began to show gradual improvement and symmetry.

docs.title: peculiar
docs.text:
• 词性：adj.
  • 释义：独特的
  • 例句：The peculiar hieroglyphics...

docs.title: porcelain
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：瓷器
  • 例句：They also made use of porcelain and small seashells.

docs.title: bead
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：珠子
  • 例句：The need of stringing them like beads for preservation.

docs.title: furnished
docs.text:
• 词性：v. (past)
  • 释义：提供
  • 例句：The first money used in America was furnished chiefly by Great Britain and Spain.

docs.title: chiefly
docs.text:
• 词性：adv.
  • 释义：主要地
  • 例句：Furnished chiefly by Great Britain and Spain.

docs.title: scarcity
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：稀缺，缺乏
  • 例句：The limited amount, scarcity, and need of it tempted the colony...

docs.title: 📘 Vocabulary: Graffiti – Street Art or Crime
wielding
docs.text:
• 词性：v.
  • 释义：挥舞，使用（工具）
  • 例句：He was wielding a spray can confidently.

docs.title: spray
docs.text:
• 词性：n./v.
  • 释义：喷雾；喷洒
  • 例句：She used spray paint on the wall.

docs.title: polarised
docs.text:
• 词性：adj./v.
  • 释义：分化，对立
  • 例句：The issue has polarised public opinion.

docs.title: verdict
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：裁决，判决
  • 例句：The jury returned a verdict of not guilty.

docs.title: conspiracy
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：阴谋，共谋
  • 例句：They were arrested for conspiracy to damage property.

docs.title: mural
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：壁画
  • 例句：A large mural was painted on the building.

docs.title: popped down
docs.text:
• 词性：phr.v.
  • 释义：顺路去
  • 例句：We popped down to the Tate during lunch.

docs.title: irony
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：讽刺
  • 例句：There’s irony in the juxtaposition of law and art.

docs.title: juxtaposition
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：并列（对比）
  • 例句：The juxtaposition of the two events is striking.

docs.title: sneaking
docs.text:
• 词性：v.
  • 释义：偷偷进入
  • 例句：He kept sneaking his art into museums.

docs.title: retrospective
docs.text:
• 词性：adj./n.
  • 释义：回顾的；回顾展
  • 例句：The museum held a retrospective of his work.

docs.title: legitimised
docs.text:
• 词性：v.
  • 释义：使合法化
  • 例句：Banksy legitimised the genre of street art.

docs.title: spawned
docs.text:
• 词性：v.
  • 释义：催生，产生
  • 例句：His work spawned a wave of imitators.

docs.title: immodesty
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：不谦虚
  • 例句：He claimed with genuine immodesty.

docs.title: draconian
docs.text:
• 词性：adj.
  • 释义：严厉的
  • 例句：They face draconian punishments.

docs.title: convict
docs.text:
• 词性：n./v.
  • 释义：囚犯；定罪
  • 例句：The convict was sentenced to two years.

docs.title: curator
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：策展人
  • 例句：The curator organized a street art exhibition.

docs.title: schizophrenic
docs.text:
• 词性：adj.
  • 释义：矛盾的，分裂的
  • 例句：Society has a schizophrenic attitude to graffiti.

docs.title: estate
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：房地产
  • 例句：He works in real estate.

docs.title: dichotomy
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：二分法，对立
  • 例句：There is a dichotomy between freedom and order.

docs.title: reconciled
docs.text:
• 词性：v./adj.
  • 释义：调和；和解
  • 例句：The two ideas were reconciled.

docs.title: loath
docs.text:
• 词性：adj.
  • 释义：憎恶的，讨厌的
  • 例句：Citizens were loath to accept graffiti.

docs.title: deterioration
docs.text:
• 词性：n.
  • 释义：恶化，衰退
  • 例句：They see graffiti as a sign of deterioration.

docs.title: 🌍 背景话题：经济发展与消费结构
✍️ 可迁移句式（中英对照）
docs.text:
• 英：Government support is essential to ensure basic human dignity. 中：政府支持对保障基本人性尊严至关重要。

  • 英：Strengthen the economic cycle at the grassroots level. 中：强化基层的经济循环。

  • 英：Promote inclusive and sustainable growth. 中：促进包容性和可持续增长。

  • 英：Only a small portion of their consumption goes into sectors related to public welfare or job creation. 中：他们的消费中只有一小部分用于公共福利或创造就业的领域。

  • 英：A mature government must implement measures such as low-income subsidies, health insurance, and pension systems. 中：一个成熟的政府应当推行诸如低收入补贴、医疗保险与养老金制度等措施。

docs.title: 🧩 适用话题分类
docs.text:
• 社会公平 / 收入分配
  • 政府责任 / 公共政策
  • 经济增长 / 消费刺激

docs.title: 🌍 背景话题：教育公平、科技与教学方式
✍️ 可迁移句式（中英对照）
docs.text:
• 英：Everyone should be equal in education, whether rich or poor. 中：每个人在教育中都应当享有平等，无论贫富。
  • 英：A responsible government should not ignore disadvantaged groups. 中：一个有责任感的政府不应忽视弱势群体。
  • 英：Overuse of computers also raises legal issues. 中：过度使用电脑也会引发法律问题。
  • 英：It is unreasonable to deny the positive effects of technology. 中：否认科技的积极作用是不合理的。
  • 英：Multimedia classes can create more interaction than traditional classes. 中：多媒体课堂可以创造比传统课堂更多的互动。
  • 英：Some operations that are difficult to describe can be demonstrated using visualization tools. 中：一些难以用语言描述的操作可以通过可视化工具进行演示。
  • 英：I reject a one-size-fits-all approach and advocate improving teaching by combining both technology and traditional methods. 中：我反对一刀切的方法，提倡将科技与传统方法结合以改善教学。

docs.title: 🧩 适用话题分类
docs.text:
• 教育公平
  • 科技与教育
  • 政府职责
  • 健康与社会
  • 法律与道德

docs.title: 🌍 Writing Expressions – Economic Progress & National Success
docs.text: tags: #ielts/writing/task2 #writing/useful #writing/topic-economic-development

docs.title: ✍️ 背景话题
docs.text:
• 国家成功的衡量标准（经济与其他因素）
  • 议论文（Argument 型） – 部分同意立场

docs.title: 1. 引言类
docs.text:
• be the sole indicator of… – 成为……的唯一指标
  • a multifaceted concept – 多方面的概念
  • should not be confined to… – 不应局限于……

docs.title: 2. 经济发展论证类
docs.text:
• play a pivotal role in… – 在……中发挥关键作用
  • lay the foundation for… – 为……奠定基础
  • public welfare system – 公共福利体系
  • maintain national security – 维护国家安全

docs.title: 3. 其他衡量标准论证类
docs.text:
• the will of the people – 民心所向
  • social cohesion – 社会凝聚力
  • drive scientific and technological innovation – 推动科技创新

docs.title: 4. 结论类
docs.text:
• a holistic approach – 整体性方法
  • strike a balance between… and… – 在……与……之间取得平衡
  • true prosperity – 真正的繁荣

docs.title: 🧩 适用话题分类
docs.text:
• 经济发展
  • 国家治理
  • 科技与创新
  • 社会幸福与民生

docs.title: ✍️ Writing Review - 2025-08-07
docs.text: tags: #ielts/writing/task2 #writing/gpt-edited #ielts/economy

docs.title: 📄 Prompt / 题目
docs.text: Some people think encouraging the rich to spend more helps economic growth, while others believe governments should help the poor to consume. To what extent do you agree or disagree?

docs.title: 📝 My Draft
docs.text:
There is ongoing debate whether ecounraging the rich to spend more or help the poor to consume can boost the economy better.In my opoinion,provide the lower-income groups is more effective and socialble way.

It's sure that some of the poor doesn't have enough money due to the lazy habit.But there're still many of them can't work nor doesn't want work,because of illness,disable,or just old age.Government support is really essenstial to ensure ther basic life.Without the lowest care,they will be homeless,died of disease...It's not a responsible society doing!A mature government must take action like low-income assistance,health insurance,and pension fund.

Not denying promot the consumption desire of the wealthy can help growthing the economic.But it need lots of works and cost. The wealth people always want better,so they focus on the luxury and high-end goods.So the most money will go aboard or go to the luxury,just a little part of them will take part in people's livelihood.With the outflow of cash,national property will be hurt.However if someone decorate there house,it can provide some working position for the poor.The circle of economy is a nice way to boost the country economy.

While both approaches can contribute to the economy, ensuring the basic consumption ability of the poor not only strengthens social resilience but also promotes inclusive and lasting growth.

docs.title: 🧠 Feedback Summary
docs.text: 项目 分数 评语 Task Response / 内容回应 6.0 /9 明确表达立场，结构完整，但论证层次稍浅，缺乏细节支持。 Coherence & Cohesion / 结构衔接 5.5 /9 有基本段落与连接，但句间过渡略跳跃，连接词单一。 Lexical Resource / 词汇多样性 5.5 /9 词汇有重复，部分用词不准确，拼写错误较多。 Grammar Accuracy / 语法准确性 5.0 /9 有尝试用长句，但语法错误频繁，限制表达清晰度。

docs.title: 🔁 Revised Version
docs.text:
There is ongoing debate about whether encouraging the rich to spend more or helping the poor to consume is a better way to stimulate economic growth. In my opinion, supporting lower-income groups is a more effective and socially responsible approach.

While it is true that some individuals may struggle financially due to personal reasons, many others are unable to work due to illness, disability, or old age. In such cases, government support is essential to ensure basic human dignity. Without even the minimum social protection, people may become homeless or die from preventable conditions. This is not what a responsible society should allow. A mature government must implement measures such as low-income subsidies, health insurance, and pension systems.

Admittedly, encouraging the wealthy to spend more can contribute to economic activity to some extent. However, this approach often requires high costs and yields limited returns. Wealthy individuals tend to focus their spending on luxury goods or overseas markets, which may not directly benefit the domestic economy. Only a small portion of their consumption goes into sectors related to public welfare or job creation. In contrast, investment in basic services or housing renovation can generate employment opportunities and strengthen the economic cycle at the grassroots level.

While both approaches may have their merits, ensuring the basic consumption ability of lower-income groups not only strengthens social resilience but also promotes inclusive and sustainable growth. Therefore, governments should prioritize policies that empower the poor, which will result in a more balanced and robust economy in the long run.

docs.title: 📍 Expression Highlights
docs.text:
• 亮点表达：

    • government support is essential to ensure basic human dignity

    • strengthen the economic cycle at the grassroots level

    • promote inclusive and sustainable growth

  • 可替换的弱表达：

    • "growthing the economic" → "stimulate economic growth"

    • "go to the luxury" → "spend on luxury goods"

    • "a nice way to boost the country economy" → "strengthen the national economy"

docs.title: ✍️ Writing Review - 2025-08-10
docs.text: tags: #ielts/writing/task2 #writing/gpt-edited

docs.title: 📄 Prompt / 题目
docs.text: Some people think economic performance is the best indicator of a country's success, while others believe there are more important factors. Discuss both views and give your opinion.

docs.title: 📝 My Draft
docs.text:
Just like one thousand people have a thousand Hamlets in their eyes. Different people have different opinions that how to describe a country's success. Some people said the economic progress is the sole indicator of that,and other people think it isn't a simple question,national level is a multifaceted concept. My opinion is that although economic success is a important factor of how the country's success,but civilization's walfare and technique enovation level are also important factors.

Economy is closely related with national consturction. Both livelihood security、national defense construction need lots of fund. Therefore if the country's economic backwardness,it's hard to have a powerful country. The essence of international cooperation is the exchange of benefits. If you don't have enough money or power,it's difficult to gain the value. So the economy status is the base of successful country.

The country belongs to the people. National development cannot be separated from the people. So I think how is people's happiness is a vital one in the national strength evaluation system. Goverment should find out how can improve people's livelihood.

In the 21 century,technology is the country's continus development's motivation.Facing the challenge in global,we need to increase our country's productivity.

In conclusion,economy is the basement of country.But we still shouldn't ignore the civilization and technology development.

docs.title: 🧠 Feedback Summary
docs.text: 项目 分数 评语 Task Response / 内容回应 6.0 立场明确，但观点展开不足，缺少细节与论证支持。 Coherence & Cohesion / 结构衔接 6.0 逻辑顺序清晰，但衔接词单一且部分段落连接生硬。 Lexical Resource / 词汇多样性 5.5 有尝试使用较高级词汇，但存在拼写错误与搭配不当；词汇重复较多。 Grammar Accuracy / 语法准确性 5.5 冠词、时态、单复数等语法错误频繁，句型单一，缺少复杂句结构。

docs.title: 7.0版本
docs.text:
People hold varying opinions on how to define a country's success. Some argue that economic progress is the sole indicator, while others believe that national success is a multifaceted concept. I believe that although economic success is an important factor, social welfare and the level of technological innovation are equally significant.

A strong economy provides the foundation for national development. Both livelihood security and national defense require substantial funds. If a country is economically backward, it is difficult for it to become powerful. Moreover, the essence of international cooperation lies in mutual benefit; without sufficient economic strength, it is challenging to gain advantages. Thus, a country's economic status forms the basis of its overall success.

A nation ultimately belongs to its people. Therefore, people's happiness is a vital component in evaluating national strength. Governments should explore effective ways to improve living standards, such as investing in healthcare, education, and social security. Without public satisfaction, even the wealthiest nations may face instability.

In the 21st century, technology serves as the driving force for continuous development. Facing global challenges, countries need to enhance productivity and competitiveness through innovation. Those who lead in science and technology are better positioned to sustain long-term growth.

In conclusion, while the economy is the foundation of a country's success, it should not be considered in isolation. Social welfare and technological advancement are equally important pillars in achieving sustainable national development.

docs.title: 7.5版本
docs.text:
Just as one thousand people may have one thousand Hamlets in their eyes, people hold diverse views on how to measure a country's success. Some argue that economic progress is the sole indicator, while others believe it is a far more complex issue and that national strength is a multifaceted concept. In my view, although economic achievement is an important element in assessing a country's success, the well-being of its people and the level of technological innovation are equally crucial.

The economy is closely linked to national development. Both social welfare systems and national defense construction require substantial financial resources. Therefore, if a country is economically backward, it is difficult for it to become strong and competitive. The essence of international cooperation lies in mutual benefit; without sufficient economic capacity, it is hard to gain meaningful advantages. In this sense, economic strength forms the foundation of a successful nation.

A country ultimately belongs to its people, and national development cannot be sustained without their support. Thus, the level of public happiness is a vital component in evaluating national power. Governments should identify effective ways to improve people's living standards, such as investing in healthcare, education, and housing. Without public satisfaction, even the wealthiest countries may face instability.

In the 21st century, technology serves as the driving force behind continuous progress. Facing global challenges, nations must enhance productivity and competitiveness through innovation. Countries that take the lead in science and technology are better positioned to sustain long-term growth and to respond effectively to international crises.

In conclusion, the economy is indeed the cornerstone of a nation's success, but it should not be considered in isolation. Social well-being and technological advancement are equally important pillars in building a strong and sustainable country.

docs.title: 📍 Expression Highlights
docs.text:
• multifaceted concept → 多层面的概念
  • economic status forms the basis of... → 经济地位构成……的基础
  • a vital component in evaluating national strength → 评估国力的重要组成部分
  • serves as the driving force for continuous development → 成为持续发展的驱动力
  • should not be considered in isolation → 不应孤立地考虑

docs.title: 📄 Essay Title
docs.text: Some people think that schools should stop using books and use computers instead.

docs.title: 📝 Task Response (TR) - 6.0
docs.text: • 立场明确，论据覆盖了经济、健康、法律和教育方法，但部分论述表述不够深入，例证有限。结论段有重申观点但语言略模糊（如 "reject the one-size-fits-all instead" 不够精确）。

docs.title: 🔗 Coherence & Cohesion (CC) - 6.0
docs.text: • 段落结构合理，使用了一些连接词（On the other hand, In conclusion），但衔接短语较少，句间过渡不够流畅，有些句子之间显得突兀。

docs.title: 💡 Lexical Resource (LR) - 5.5
docs.text: • 尝试使用学术词（multimedia, disadvantaged groups, visualization），但存在大量拼写错误（techinic→technology/technique, goverment→government, availiable→available）和搭配问题（has a relative with → is related to）。

docs.title: ⚙️ Grammatical Range & Accuracy (GRA) - 5.5
docs.text: • 有多种句型（定语从句、条件句）但频繁出现语法错误（时态、冠词、单复数、介词使用），句子结构有时不完整或不地道。

docs.title: 📌 Sentence-level Feedback
docs.text: Original Issue Correction In 21 century,with the rapid development of techinic,some people think the computer can instead the book in school. 拼写 / 搭配 / 冠词 / 时态 In the 21st century, with the rapid development of technology, some people think that computers can replace books in schools. I don't agree with that viewpoint. 语气 I disagree with this viewpoint. The using computer rather the book in class is not availiable, but technique can still make a good job in teaching. 用词 / 语法 Using computers instead of books in class is not feasible, but technology can still play an important role in teaching. If we use computer,the high economic cost will reject lots of poor family. 搭配 / 单复数 / 逻辑 If we use computers, the high economic cost will exclude many poor families. Books cost less money and recyclable. 语法 Books cost less money and are recyclable. A goverment which is responsible shouldn't ignore the disadvantaged groups. 拼写 / 冠词 A government which is responsible shouldn't ignore disadvantaged groups. On the other hand, watching digital screen has a relative with teenagers' declining eyesight. 搭配 / 复数 On the other hand, watching digital screens is related to teenagers' declining eyesight. Abuse of using computer also has a legal issue. 搭配 Overuse of computers also raises legal issues. We can convert books and notes easily which bring a piracy risk. 时态 / 定语从句 We can easily convert books and notes, which brings a risk of piracy. It's terrible that denying the technic positive effect. 用词 / 语法 It is unreasonable to deny the positive effects of technology. The multimedia class can make more times of interaction than traditional class. 搭配 Multimedia classes can create more interaction than traditional classes. Some operation which are difficult to describe can use visualization tools to show the process. 主谓搭配 / 逻辑 Some operations that are difficult to describe can be demonstrated using visualization tools. I reject the one-size-fits-all instead, and improve the teaching mode with both technique and traditional. 逻辑 / 用词 I reject a one-size-fits-all approach, and advocate improving teaching by combining both technology and traditional methods. Hope the reasonable use of computer and multimedia can achieve a win-win situation of education equity and quality improvement. 语法 I hope that the reasonable use of computers and multimedia can achieve a win-win situation for educational equity and quality improvement.

docs.title: 🖋️ Polished Version
docs.text:
In the 21st century, with the rapid development of technology, some people think that computers can replace books in schools. I disagree with this viewpoint. Using computers instead of books in class is not feasible, but technology can still play an important role in teaching.

Everyone should be equal in education, whether rich or poor. If we use computers, the high economic cost will exclude many poor families. Books cost less money and are recyclable. A responsible government should not ignore disadvantaged groups. On the other hand, watching digital screens is related to teenagers’ declining eyesight. Overuse of computers also raises legal issues. We can easily convert books and notes, which brings a risk of piracy.

It is unreasonable to deny the positive effects of technology. Multimedia classes can create more interaction than traditional classes. Some operations that are difficult to describe can be demonstrated using visualization tools, making the learning process more engaging and efficient.

In conclusion, I reject a one-size-fits-all approach and advocate improving teaching by combining both technology and traditional methods. I hope that the reasonable use of computers and multimedia can achieve a win-win situation for educational equity and quality improvement.

docs.title: 📚 Next Steps
docs.text:
1. Review academic spelling and collocations (e.g., replace 'technic' with 'technology').
  2. Practice article usage and plural forms.
  3. Expand range of cohesive devices to improve flow between ideas.
  4. Strengthen examples to support each argument.
